tool_description: This Unofficial API will retrieve the latest Washington Post articles
name: Washington Post
title: Washington Post

api_list.name: List All News
api_list.description: This endpoint will retrieve all articles associated with the specified category

api_list.name: List All Categories
api_list.description: This endpoint will retrieve all the Washington post categories that can be used with our API
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://washington-post.p.rapidapi.com/categories"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "washington-post.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://washington-post.p.rapidapi.com/categories"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "washington-post.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
